trans-unit.source: Marks each type of member that is defined as a derived class of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Marca cada tipo de membro que é definido como uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>.</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: These enumeration values are returned by the following properties: - <xref:System.Type.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Estes valores de enumeração são devolvidos pelas seguintes propriedades:- <xref:System.Type.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Type.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the MemberTypes value for a type: 1.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor de MemberTypes para um tipo de: 1.

trans-unit.source: Get a <xref:System.Type> object that represents that type.
trans-unit.target: Obter um <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa desse tipo.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Type.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter o valor da <xref:System.Type.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Type.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To get the MemberTypes values for the members of a type.: 1.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os valores de MemberTypes para os membros de um tipo.: 1.

trans-unit.source: Get a <xref:System.Type> object that represents that type.
trans-unit.target: Obter um <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa desse tipo.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> array that represents the members of that type by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Obter o <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>matriz que representa os membros desse tipo chamando a <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the value of the From the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for each member in the array.
trans-unit.target: Obter o valor da <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para cada membro da matriz.</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A `switch` statement in C# or `Select Case` statement in Visual Basic is typically used to process member types.
trans-unit.target: A `switch` instrução em c# ou `Select Case` instrução no Visual Basic, normalmente, é utilizada para processar tipos de membro.

trans-unit.source: MemberTypes matches CorTypeAttr as defined in the corhdr.h file.
trans-unit.target: MemberTypes corresponde CorTypeAttr, tal como definido no ficheiro corhdr.h.

trans-unit.source: Specifies all member types.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a todos os tipos de membro.
